definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[בשׂם]] (have a sweet odour, cf. Aram. [[בְּסִים]], bsem be sweet, pleasant, Pa. basm to delight, [[בַּסִּימָא]], sweet; Palm. [[בשימא]] ([[משחא]]) Vog:JAs 1883, Août. Sept. 153 1. 12, 155 1. 16, 18, 20 etc. spiced (oil), cf. Reckendorf:ZMG 1888, 403; As. bašâmu, Pa. make fine, beautiful COT:Gloss).
